name: hex-blender
description: a library for finding out the hex value between two hex values.

scripts.build:major: rimraf dist && npm --no-git-tag-version version major && rollup -c
scripts.build:minor: rimraf dist && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && rollup -c
scripts.build:patch: rimraf dist && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && rollup -c

author: KnowsCount <knowscount@gmail.com>
